Test Case Description: Verify that the Account Overview section displays correct account information.
Pre-Conditions: User is logged in and on the dashboard/home page.
Test Steps:
1. Open the Dashboard/Home page.
2. Check the Account Overview section for correct account details.
Expected Result: Account Overview section displays correct account details including balance, plan, and pending actions.

Test Case Description: Verify that the Quick Links section provides access to essential functions such as viewing bills, managing plans, or checking service requests.
Pre-Conditions: User is logged in and on the dashboard/home page.
Test Steps:
1. Open the Dashboard/Home page.
2. Click on each link in the Quick Links section.
Expected Result: All Quick Links are functional and redirect to the appropriate sections (e.g., View Bills, Manage Plans, etc.).

Test Case Description: Verify that all links in the Navigation Menu on the left panel redirect to the correct sections.
Pre-Conditions: User is logged in and on the dashboard/home page.
Test Steps:
1. Open the Dashboard/Home page.
2. Click on each link in the Navigation Menu.
Expected Result: All Navigation Menu links are functional and redirect to the correct sections (e.g., Plans, Billing, Services, etc.).

Test Case Description: Verify that the Account Balance is displayed correctly in the Account Overview section.
Pre-Conditions: User is logged in and on the dashboard/home page.
Test Steps:
1. Open the Dashboard/Home page.
2. Check the Account Balance section for correct balance display.

Test Case Description: Verify that the Current Plan information is displayed accurately in the Account Overview section.
Pre-Conditions: User is logged in and on the dashboard/home page.
Test Steps:
1. Open the Dashboard/Home page.
2. Check the Current Plan section for accurate plan details.
Expected Result: Current Plan information is displayed accurately.

Test Case Description: Verify that recent transactions or service requests are displayed in the right panel.
Pre-Conditions: User is logged in and on the dashboard/home page.
Test Steps:
1. Open the Dashboard/Home page.
2. Review the Recent Transactions section for correct information.
Expected Result: Recent Transactions or Requests are displayed correctly.

Test Case Description: Verify that the Service Status section accurately reflects the user's current service status.
Pre-Conditions: User is logged in and on the dashboard/home page.
Test Steps:
1. Open the Dashboard/Home page.
2. Check the Service Status section for current service information.
Expected Result: Service Status is displayed accurately based on the user's current services.

Test Case Description: Verify that each link in the Navigation Menu redirects to the correct pages (Plans, Billing, Service Requests).
Pre-Conditions: User is logged in and on the dashboard/home page.
Test Steps:
1. Open the Dashboard/Home page.
2. Click on each Navigation Menu link and verify redirection to correct sections.
Expected Result: Each Navigation Menu link redirects to the correct section.
